    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.util.List<Gdl> description)
        Description copied from class: StateMachine
        Initializes the StateMachine to describe the given game rules.

        This method should only be called once, and it should be called before any other methods on the StateMachine.

        Specified by:
        initialize in class StateMachine

      • getGoal

        public int getGoal(MachineState state,
                   Role role)
            throws GoalDefinitionException
        Description copied from class: StateMachine
        Returns the goal value for the given role in the given state. Goal values are always between 0 and 100.
        Specified by:
        getGoal in class StateMachine
        Throws:
        GoalDefinitionException - if there is no goal value or more than one goal value for the given role in the given state. If this occurs when this is called on a terminal state, this indicates an error in either the game description or the StateMachine implementation.

      • getInitialState

        public MachineState getInitialState()
        Description copied from class: StateMachine
        Returns the initial state of the game.
        Specified by:
        getInitialState in class StateMachine

      • getLegalMoves

        public java.util.List<Move> getLegalMoves(MachineState state,
                                          Role role)
                                   throws MoveDefinitionException
        Description copied from class: StateMachine
        Returns a list containing every move that is legal for the given role in the given state.
        Specified by:
        getLegalMoves in class StateMachine
        Throws:
        MoveDefinitionException - if the role has no legal moves. This indicates an error in either the game description or the StateMachine implementation.

      • getNextState

        public MachineState getNextState(MachineState state,
                                 java.util.List<Move> moves)
                          throws TransitionDefinitionException
        Description copied from class: StateMachine
        Returns the next state of the game given the current state and a joint move list containing one move per role.
        Specified by:
        getNextState in class StateMachine
        moves - A list containing one move per role. The moves should be listed in the same order as roles are listed by StateMachine.getRoles().
        Throws:
        TransitionDefinitionException - indicates an error in either the game description or the StateMachine implementation.

      • getRoles

        public java.util.List<Role> getRoles()
        Description copied from class: StateMachine
        Returns a list of the roles in the game, in the same order as they were defined in the game description.

        The result will be the same as calling Role.computeRoles(List) on the game rules used to initialize this state machine.

        Specified by:
        getRoles in class StateMachine

      • isTerminal

        public boolean isTerminal(MachineState state)
        Description copied from class: StateMachine
        Returns true if and only if the given state is a terminal state (i.e. the game is over).
        Specified by:
        isTerminal in class StateMachine
